hadiths.text: Abu Huraira (Allah be pleased with him) reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:Dajjal will come from the eastern side with the intention of attacking Medina until he will get down behind Uhud. Then the angels will turn his face towards Syria and there he will perish

chapter.ara-name: باب صِيَانَةِ الْمَدِينَةِ مِنْ دُخُولِ الطَّاعُونِ وَالدَّجَّالِ إِلَيْهَا
chapter.eng-name: Al-Madinah is protected against the plague and the Dajjal entering it
